attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The Honda BR-V comes standard with a 4 year/60 000 km Service Plan,5 year/200 000 km Warranty and 3 years AA Roadside Assistance. It has auto air conditioning, rear air conditioning vents, it has the ability to seat 7 passengers comfortably, and many more other features. The Honda BR-V takes the idea of SUV to a whole new level. The BR-V’s 7-seater utility prowess – with additional features – comes together seamlessly with a strong and sporty exterior to make it the perfect car for that city drive or weekend getaway. It’s everything you want in an SUV and more

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor made Deal to match your pocket, trade-ins are welcome, and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.

This beautiful vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance. Book your test drive today!
